summary:
**BAE Systems: A Summary**

BAE Systems is a big British company that makes planes, ships, and things to keep people safe. It's the biggest maker of these things in Britain and one of the biggest in the world. They started in 1999 when two older companies merged.

BAE has important jobs with the UK, US, and other countries' armies. They helped make the F-35 fighter jet, Eurofighter Typhoon, and cool things like the first commercial jet plane and the world's first VTOL (vertical take-off and landing) attack aircraft.

You can find BAE stocks on the London Stock Exchange.
title: BAE Systems
